labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The list doesn't display correctly unless you load the member list in each server you are in
data.expected_result: The list should display directly without having to load the member list in each server
data.short_description: Servers you have in common with friends don't display correctly
data.steps_to_repro: - Find some friends who are on some servers where you are - Check the list of common server icons next to your friends (I have this : <https://puu.sh/xfFcB/8b931c0d28.png>) - Go in each one of the servers you are in, until the list of members loads and displays completely - go back to your friend list and check the server icons (I now have this : <https://puu.sh/xfFh3/6c26b12130.png>) - Notice that some servers are still missing (For example with this friend : <https://puu.sh/xfFdw/aba470f52c.png>)
